```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
bikedata <- list.files(pattern = "*-citibike-tripdata.csv") %>% 
  map_df(~read_csv(.))

# NYC Covid Data: https://github.com/nychealth/coronavirus-data/tree/master/trends
coviddata <- read_csv("COVIDcasedata.csv")

# NYC Weather Data: New York, NY 10023 https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets/GHCND/locations/ZIP:10023/detail
weatherdata <- read_csv("NYCWeather.csv") %>%
  select(DATE, AWND, PRCP, SNOW, SNWD, TMAX, TMIN)

# clean up column names
colnames(bikedata) = c("trip_duration", "start_time","stop_time","start_station_id","start_station_name","start_station_latitude","start_station_longitude","end_station_id","end_station_name","end_station_latitude","end_station_longitude","bike_id","user_type","birth_year","gender")

# add trip_date based on start_time
bikedata$trip_date <- as.Date(bikedata$start_time)
```



```{r}
library(lubridate)
bikedata <- bikedata %>%
  mutate(age = 2020 - birth_year) %>%
  mutate(day_of_week = wday(start_time, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE))

bike_weather <- bikedata %>%
  left_join(weatherdata, by = c("trip_date" = "DATE"))
```

```{r}
#get subway station data 
#link: https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Subway-Stations/arq3-7z49
subway_sta <- read_csv("DOITT_SUBWAY_STATION_01_13SEPT2010.csv")
```

```{r}
library(stringr)
#clean up geom point 
temp1 <- subway_sta %>%
  mutate(the_geom = str_remove(the_geom, "POINT")) %>%
  mutate(the_geom = str_remove(the_geom, " \\(")) %>%
  mutate(the_geom = str_remove(the_geom, "\\)")) 

x <- str_split(temp1$the_geom, " ", simplify = TRUE)
geom_sta <- as.data.frame(x) %>%
  rename(station_long = V1,
         station_lat = V2) %>%
  mutate(station_long = as.numeric(station_long),
         station_lat = as.numeric(station_lat))

subway_station <- cbind(temp1, geom_sta) %>%
  select(c(3,7,8))
```

```{r}
start_station <- bike_weather %>%
  distinct(start_station_id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  select(start_station_id, start_station_longitude, start_station_latitude)
```

```{r}
#the closet subway station for each bike start station
library(spatialrisk)
distance_subway <- purrr::map2_dfr(start_station$start_station_latitude, start_station$start_station_longitude, 
                  ~spatialrisk::points_in_circle(subway_station, .y, .x, 
                                                 lon = station_long, 
                                                 lat = station_lat, 
                                                 radius = 1e6)[1,], 
                .id = "id_bike")
start_station$id_bike <- 1:nrow(start_station) 
start_station$id_bike <- as.factor(start_station$id_bike)

library(ggmap)
library(tidygeocoder)
#get zipcode, city, suburb, state from https://nominatim.org/ 
#comment out after the first run- took a long time
start_geo <- start_station %>%
   reverse_geocode(lat = start_station_latitude, long = start_station_longitude, method = "osm", 
                  full_results = TRUE) 

#save(start_geo, file = "start_geo.Rdata")
start_geosub <- start_geo %>%
  select(id_bike, start_station_id, start_station_longitude, start_station_latitude, suburb, city, postcode) 

#make zipcode consistent and manually correct mistakes
start_geocode <- start_geosub %>%
  mutate(postcode = str_remove(postcode, "-[0-9]{0,4}")) %>%
  mutate(postcode = str_remove(postcode, ":[0-9]{0,4}")) %>%
  mutate(postcode = recode(postcode, 
                           "100" = "10019",
                           "112321" = "11231",
                           "104515" = "10451",
                           "100090" = "10009",
                           "100374" = "10037",
                           "100014" = "10014",
                           "100090" = "10009",
                           "100036" = "10036",
                           "11227" = "11217",
                           "10000" = "10007")) %>%
  mutate(postcode = ifelse(start_station_id == 367, "10022", 
                           ifelse(start_station_id == 3443, "10019",
                                  ifelse(start_station_id == 3263, "10003", postcode))))

library(zipcodeR)
#get census data from zipcode 
nyctract <- reverse_zipcode(start_geocode$postcode) %>%
  select(zipcode, major_city, county, population_density, median_household_income)

start_census <- start_geocode %>%
  left_join(nyctract, by = c("postcode" = "zipcode"))
```

```{r}
#join closet subway station to start_station data 
start_subway <- start_census %>%
  left_join(distance_subway, by = "id_bike") %>%
  select(-c(start_station_longitude, start_station_latitude, 
            id_bike, station_long, station_lat))
#join distance and geocode back to bike data 
bike_join <- bike_weather %>%
  left_join(start_subway, by = "start_station_id") %>%
  rename(subway_name = NAME) %>%
  mutate(trip_min = trip_duration/60) 
#subset of sample, create distance 
#write.csv(bike_join, "bike_join.csv")
```
